title: Welcome to the Playground
episode_desc: Orphaned sisters Vi and Powder bring trouble to Zaun's underground streets in the wake of a heist in posh Piltover.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: The Base Violence Necessary for Change
episode_desc: An epic showdown between old rivals results in a fateful moment for Zaun. Jayce and Viktor risk it all for their research.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Some Mysteries Are Better Left Unsolved
episode_desc: Idealistic inventor Jayce attempts to harness magic through science --- despite his mentor's warning. Criminal kingpin Silco tests a powerful substance.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Happy Progress Day!
episode_desc: With Piltover prospering from their tech, Jayce and Viktor weigh their next move. A familiar face re-emerges from Zaun to wreak havoc.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Everybody Wants to Be My Enemy
episode_desc: Rogue enforcer Caitlyn tours the undercity alongside Vi to track down Silco. Jayce puts a target on his back trying to root out Piltover corruption.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: When These Walls Come Tumbling Down
episode_desc: An eager protege undermines his mentor on the council as a magical tech rapidly evolves. With authorities in pursuit, Jinx must face her past.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Oil and Water
episode_desc: Disowned heir Mel and her visiting mother trade combat tactics. Caitlyn and Vi forge an unlikely alliance. Jinx undergoes a startling change.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: The Boy Savior
episode_desc: Caitlyn and Vi meet an ally in Zaun's streets and head into a frenzied battle with a common foe. Viktor makes a dire decision.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: The Monster You Created
episode_desc: Perilously close to war, the leaders of Piltover and Zaun reach an ultimatum. But a fateful standoff changes both cities forever.
show_desc: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.
